scripts.build: bun run tsc && bun run vite build
scripts.validate: bun run tsc --noEmit && bun run test:complete && bunx biome lint
scripts.check: bunx biome check --fix && bun run test:complete
scripts.full-check: bun run validate && echo '✅ All validations passed!'
scripts.test-all: echo '🧪 Running comprehensive tests...' && bun run test:complete && echo '✅ All 106 tests passed!'
scripts.verify: echo '🔍 Verifying project...' && bun run tsc --noEmit && bun run test:complete && echo '✅ TypeScript OK + All tests passed!'
scripts.quality: echo '📊 Running quality checks...' && bunx biome format --write && bun run test:complete && echo '✅ Code formatted + All tests passed!'
